1400750.name: Cartridge Monsters: Origins
1400750.description:
The Assignment As a Capture Clan operative, you've been dispatched to investigate a mysterious tower appearing in Rendis. This caused dungeons to appear in the surrounding towns. These corrupted spaces contain dangerous wild Ammon, powerful Cartridge Casters and guardians that must be eliminated to restore peace.

Over 100 Ammon to Capture Use your Cartridge Caster to weaken and capture wild Ammon as you explore. Each dungeon houses unique species, but stay vigilant for rare and powerful creatures lurking in the shadows. Securing them will grant you a tactical edge in future battles.

Hunt for Epic Ammon Not all Ammon are created equal. To build the ultimate team, you'll need to hunt for the ultra-powerful Rare and Epic variants. These elite creatures are more dangerous and much harder to capture, testing both your skill and your luck. Track them down to add their incredible strength to your roster.

Hunt for Legendary Casters The appearance of dungeons means one thing: new Cartridge Casters have surfaced. Legends within the Clan claims that any dungeon, no matter the danger, could conceal a Caster of legendary power. Scour every hidden path and claim these mysterious weapons for yourself.

Become a Local Hero The townsfolk are desperate for help. While completing their requests will earn you rewards, the real prize is the knowledge they share... Sightings of legendary Ammons.
1400750.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
